Users can add or remove individual elements within scenes—like inserting an owl into a forest or replacing a car with a spaceship—thanks to features such as \"Insert Object\" (already available) and \"Remove Object\" (rolling out soon). response_text: Here are some good free AI video translator options (for subtitles and/or dubbed voice):  Best free options  Vozo.ai – free online translator with subtitles, AI‑dubbed audio, voice cloning, and lip sync across ~110+ languages. Vozo [https://www.vozo.ai/video-translate]  BlipCut AI Video Translator – translates with subtitles and voice, plus lip sync. Free tier available. Video Translator [https://videotranslator.blipcut.com/]  CapCut (AI subtitle translator) – free tool that auto generates and translates subtitles in many languages. Great for social content. CapCut [https://www.capcut.com/tools/video-translator/]  Happy Scribe – free for first ~10 minutes of video translation (subtitles/transcript). happyscribe.com [https://www.happyscribe.com/translate-video]  Invideo AI Video Translator – free tier, supports 50+ languages with voice options. Invideo [https://invideo.io/make/video-translator/]  Other free/try options  Wayin.ai – online video translator with 100+ languages (subtitles). WayinVideo [https://wayin.ai/tools/video-translator/]  Clideo Video Translator – auto translate subtitles and voice. Clideo [https://clideo.com/video-translator]  Airmore.ai – free online subtitles and voice translation in multiple languages. airmore.ai [https://airmore.ai/video-translation]  Free tools vary in limits (video length, export ability, languages). For full translated voice + lip‑sync without heavy limits, Vozo.ai and BlipCut are often top picks. Vozo+1 [https://www.vozo.ai/video-translate]
